price: Mafarin* halittar sammai da ƙasa. Yãya ɗã zai zama a gare Shi alhãli kuwa mãta ba ta kasance ba, a gare Shi, kuma Ya halitta dukkan, kõme, kuma Shĩ, game da dukan kõme, Masani ne?
arabic: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُۥ وَلَدٞ وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ صَٰحِبَةٞۖ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Shi ne wanda Ya fãri halittarsu bã da Yã kõya daga wani ba. Sautin jan wasalin fa zaiyi sama dõmi bambanci daga mafãri watau sababin abu, ana mĩƙe sautin maddi a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: badīʿu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi annā yakūnu lahu waladun walam takun lahu ṣāḥibatun wakhalaqa kulla shayin wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
